entry.title: From monads to comonads and back
entry.content: A brief review of the paper ‘Monads from Comonads, Comonads from Monads’ by Ralf Hinze.

entry.title: A brief history of graded modalities
entry.content: I give a brief introduction to the history around graded modalities (graded (co)monads). Updated 2021-01-29: added Wadler:2003, Petricek:2013, and Petricek:2014.

entry.title: Universal Properties
entry.content: A note on universal properties and the Yoneda lemma. Updates: Added example showing representability for adjoint functors.

entry.title: Universal Properties

entry.title: Who came up with semantic brackets?
entry.content: A short post about the history of semantic brackets.

entry.title: Category Theory Notes
entry.content: A place for me to actively write about category theory. I’ll be writing these here on my blog rather than thinking about finished products. This makes sharing my notes eaiser, and is more fun. You are already able to follow along if you are intereted, because I’ll post updates to my RSS feed.

entry.title: New Blog Infrastructure
entry.content: This post introduces Metatheorem’s new blog infrastructure using Pandoc, GNU Make, and a new tool called Panfeed.
